Refreshing the Tree Component

By default, the tree component in the left pane is automatically refreshed every 30 seconds. You can change the refresh interval. In addition, you can refresh the tree component manually.

To change the refresh interval

  1. In the left pane, click Common Tasks.

  2. In the right pane, click Set Preferences.

  3. Change the value of the Refresh interval field to the desired number of seconds.

  4. Click Save.

To refresh the tree component manually

  • In the left pane, click Refresh.
